about_the_game:
===Game Description===
Run, jump, and gather building blocks...
Use the collected blocks and recipes to craft vehicles!
An action game of running, jumping, and crafting.

While riding a vehicle, you'll earn increased scores and be able to defeat enemies and obstacles!
Craft a variety of vehicles, dash through stages, and earn high scores in one go.

===Controls===
・Jump: Left-click (or SPACE on the keyboard)
・Double Jump: Left-click while jumping (or SPACE on the keyboard)
・Craft: Right-click (or SHIFT on the keyboard)
※The "CRAFT!" button at the bottom left also acts as a gauge.
　Crafting is possible when it glows yellow!

===Game Tips===
・Stars give 10 points, while building blocks and recipes provide 50 points each.
・Riding a vehicle allows you to defeat enemies and obstacles while earning scores!
・Be careful not to fall through cracked floors during jumps.
・Each vehicle has its own unique features!
・Cars increase the score gained from collecting blocks, and more.
・Trains increase the score obtained from defeating enemies.
・Rockets enhance the score earned and the number of jumps available.
・??? has its own set of features...

※I apologize if there are any mistakes as I am using a translation tool.

name: Crea Run!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7 ,8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 540M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
